ActJudges Act
SubjectBeverly Easton** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Gordon G. Easton
PrecisGranting of an annuity to BEVERLY EASTON, widow of the Hon. Gordon G. Easton, Judge of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador, Trial Division, effective August 3, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
